review: I have been very disappointed with this device. WHEN it works, it works well. But, it seems that it spends most of the time hunting for the wifi signal and after acquiring it, works well for a short time (a VERY short time) then it drops the signal! You may think the problem is with my wifi signal and you'd be wrong. The signal is VERY strong, as proven by the three laptops, two desktops, an Android tablet, an iPad tablet, three cell phones, two big screen, flat panel TVs, two high-end receivers, a Blu-ray player, two Xboxes, and two PlayStations. None of which have the slightest problem with attaining and maintaining the wifi signal anywhere in our house! Oh, did I mention the Fire Stick is only about six feet from the router?!I had very high hopes for this device and I am still willing to give it a bit more of a chance. Perhaps it only needs a "burn-in" period :-) But, if I'm still having this problem a week from now... back it goes and I'll just stream from the Xbox (which has not had any problems, just the Fire Stick with its remote control is more intuitive and easier to work for my wife than a thumb controller :-).  This review... to be continued.
